title: Superflex & Dynasty League Strategy 2022
description:
Field Yates, Stephania Bell and Daniel Dopp break down how to approach your superflex leagues including when to draft QB’s and what QB’s can jump into the elite tier. Then, the crew talks their approaches to dynasty leagues and what rookies can develop into stars.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: Fantasy Focus: How Should You Approach Superflex and Dynasty Leagues This Year?
